title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for a series
description: When there is no data available for a series, I expect the system to display a friendly error message as a reminder.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is shown.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column or series that does not have any data. 3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed as a reminder.
